gpt.output: Attack determination: Brainwash. Final evaluation confirms severe poisoning-induced collapse: BWT deteriorated from -1.74 pp to -47.86 pp (Δ -46.12 pp), old-task average accuracy fell to chance-level 10.02%, and last-task accuracy is 46.0%, below reported BrainWash baselines for EWC on CIFAR-100. Loss spikes and near-zero retention on prior tasks corroborate a reckless Brainwash pattern. No indicators of Accumulative Attack or Label Flipping are present.
warnings: Observed collapse exceeds BrainWash baselines (BWT -47.86 pp vs ~-12.6 pp; last-task 46.0% vs 51.0–58.8%).
evidence: BWT before: -1.74 pp; after: -47.86 pp; Δ = -46.12 pp (27.6× more negative).
Average accuracy across 10 tasks = 13.6% (consistent with near-chance old tasks + last-task 46%).
Last-task accuracy = 46.0%, below BrainWash EWC CIFAR-100 baselines (51.0–58.8%).
Loss spikes and collapse on tasks 6–8: losses 4.084/3.891/3.565 with 3.8–8.3% acc; vs task 9 loss 1.741 (acc 46.0%).
Pre-attack accuracies ~55–68% across seen tasks; post-attack matrix shows near-zero retention on prior tasks.
RAG verdict: Strong attack/collapse detected (BrainWash), severity high.
Run completed successfully (exit_code=0), confirming this is an evaluation result rather than an early termination.
